name: .ECD File Extension
summary: Learn about .ECD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ECD file is an encrypted document created by Cryptee, a web-based editor used to securely create and edit documents. It contains a document exported from Cryptee and is encrypted in the Cryptee format. ECD files may store text, images, video, or audio.

content: An ECD file is created when you export a document, journal, note, or another file from Cryptee. Typically, ECD files are used to backup files or transfer files from one account to another.
ECD files are only supported by Cryptee. You can open and edit the files by uploading them to Cryptee.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
